wikipedia_page.main: John Ripley VC (20 August 1867 – 14 August 1933) was a Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * John Ripley, First World War Rue du Bois, 9 May 1915
